Detailed Description

Concrete class that handles camera visualization. This class is observer for the model.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

This construct receives the maily elements for doing interface operation.

_control Reference for control class. This parameter is used for doing interface action.
_model Reference for model. This keeps interface updated.

void CameraView::update ( int  _mode,
cv::Mat &  _view,
int  _frameElapsed 
) [virtual]

This method is a part of "Observer pattern", it represents the observer. Basically, this observer update the screen.

Parameters:
_mode Current Mode of operation of calibration.
_view Target Frame used in some operation.
_frameElapsed Number of frames computed.

Implements ViewInterface.
